PROJECTS.TITLE: Web E-commerce
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: **Functional** e-commerce website made with native PHP and MySQL in a team of **4 people** using the SCRUM methodology. As the **SCRUM Master and developer**, I led the project and developed mainly the backend.

PROJECTS.TITLE: JavaFX MQTT
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Desktop application using Java to display **real time** data from sensors connected to an **MQTT broker**, Python for data extraction and CSV files for data storage.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Memory
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Memory game made with Java and JavaFX. Contains **customizable** board sizes, 3 types of cards, scoring system and translation to **multiple languages**.

ABOUT: **Development fanatic** since I was **15** years old, where I discovered the potential of programming by creating my first **mods for videogames**.
I am currently studying at **IUT de Blagnac** in **France**. I aspire to become a **software engineer** and work in an environment where I can keep **learning and growing** constantly.
In my free time, I like **listening to music** and **playing** video games. I consider myself a **curious**, **detailed** and **open-minded** person.

CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: If you have any questions, suggestions or just want to contact me, do not hesitate to do so. I will be happy to answer you!
